backend/main.mo: Main canister logic handling access control, user profiles, inquiries, search events, feedback, and behavior tracking with permission-checked query and update methods.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module converting old actor state to new format by adding empty feedback and behavior-tracking structures.
feature_evidence.json: Feature mapping file listing frontend files, components, and tests associated with feedback, analytics, and behavior-tracking features.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing prewritten one-line summaries for all frontend components and utilities.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base/theme definitions with OKLCH color variables, dark mode tokens, and global background/foreground styles.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point setting document metadata, fonts, and mounting root element for the frontend app.
frontend/PRODUCTION_PROMOTION.md: Runbook detailing prerequisites, checks, and steps for promoting the build to the production IC environment.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Top-level React component composing all site sections, handling navigation scroll logic, and recording behavior events.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Internet Identity login/logout button with React Query cache clearing and loading states.
frontend/src/components/portfolio/Lightb: Displays a fullscreen modal with image navigation, keyboard controls, and focus/scroll locking for portfolio images.
frontend/src/components/portfolio/Portfo: Renders category filter buttons allowing users to select and change the active portfolio filter.
frontend/src/components/sections/AboutSe: Shows an about section with studio description, stats, and an accompanying image.
frontend/src/components/sections/Behavio: Admin-only dashboard section that fetches and displays recent and top behavior events with refresh and error states.
frontend/src/components/sections/Booking: Displays customer inquiries with search, service-type filtering, loading states, and refresh controls.
frontend/src/components/sections/Contact: Provides a contact form with validation and inquiry submission plus contact info display.
frontend/src/components/sections/Feedbac: Admin-only panel that fetches, filters, sorts, and displays user feedback with search and refresh controls.
User form for submitting star ratings and optional feedback with validation and success handling.
frontend/src/components/sections/HeroSec: Landing hero with CTA buttons that record behavior events and trigger booking or scrolling actions.
frontend/src/components/sections/Portfol: Portfolio viewer with category filtering, item highlighting, lightbox navigation, and click event tracking.
frontend/src/components/sections/SearchA: Admin-only dashboard showing top search queries and recent search events with refresh and error states.
frontend/src/components/sections/Service: Displays a grid of photography services with icons, titles, and descriptions.
frontend/src/components/sections/Testimo: Renders a testimonials grid with client quotes, ratings, and styling details.
frontend/src/components/site/Footer.tsx: Displays site footer with branding, quick links, contact info, and social icons.
frontend/src/components/site/Header.tsx: Implements a dynamic header with navigation, search, auth-aware links, and behavior tracking.
Provides a searchable input with debounced analytics, result dropdown, and navigation callbacks.
frontend/src/config/contactInfo.ts: Exports centralized contact details including phones, emails, address, and hours.
frontend/src/content/siteContent.ts: Defines searchable site content for services, portfolio items, and sections used in site-wide search.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to user identity, refreshing dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useBodyScrollLock.ts: Hook that locks body scrolling when active and restores original styles on cleanup.
frontend/src/hooks/useFocusTrap.ts: Implements a React hook that traps keyboard focus within an active container, restoring prior focus on cleanup.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides an authentication context using Internet Identity, handling identity loading, login, logout, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Wraps backend actor calls with React Query hooks for user profiles, inquiries, admin checks, and analytics operations.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base layers, custom CSS variables, themes, and typography for the app’s styling.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/utils/behaviorTracking.ts: Defines behavior event constants and helpers for serializing and parsing analytics event details.
frontend/src/utils/inquiry.ts: Provides service-type options, label lookup, and basic validators for email, required fields, and phone numbers.
frontend/src/utils/siteSearch.ts: Implements case‑insensitive search across services, portfolio items, and site sections.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, persisting, and clearing URL and session‑stored parameters, including hash‑based routing support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration defining dark mode, content paths, extended theme settings, custom colors, animations, spacing, and plugin usage.
project_state.json: Defines the project's state, existing features, and pending feature requests for customer data collection, feedback, and behavior tracking.
